1.title: Put it on Cody's Tab
1.plot: A son takes over the failing family business and must battle his belligerent father, a volatile cook and a filthy kitchen.

2.title: Close, But No Cigar
2.plot: When an old-school Memphis cigar man takes a stab at the bar business, he discovers hiring his millennial son wasn't quite what he had expected.

3.title: Weird Science
3.plot: Two scientists struggle with the correct formula to run a successful bar.

4.title: Ground Control to Major Jon
4.plot: Jon visits a Cape Canaveral area bar frequented by local NASA astronauts. Can Jon get the bar back off the ground, or will a mother-daughter feud cause a failure to launch?

5.title: Mississippi Rears
5.plot: A Navy vet finds himself in over his head when he relies on his unqualified friend to manage his failing Mississippi dive bar.

6.title: Back to the Bar: Don't Call It a Comeback
6.plot: Taffer revisits The Comeback to see if owner Susan has been able to control her boozing; attempts are made to convince a stubborn owner to break her bizarre addiction to canned items meat.

7.title: Pole Without a Purpose
7.plot: This "Gentleman's" club in Las Vegas, Nevada is in need of some gentlemen.

8.title: An Ode to the Cap'n
8.plot: A daughter must grapple with the loss of her father as she struggles to find a way to keep his bar afloat and save his legacy.

9.title: Crazy Little Thing Called Selman
9.plot: Can Taffer tame the rocket like owner of the famed Cooper Rocket before he does himself in.

10.title: Caving In
10.plot: A mother and son find themselves at odds on how to save their failing bar. When mom steps away, her son runs the bar into the ground.

11.title: Back to the Bar: Blue in the Frog Face
11.plot: Taffer revisits The Local and finds family turmoil as Mimi is still a thorn in her son's side, while Todd and Elise of Mac & Chesters update Taffer on their marriage and bar.

12.title: Down and Out in Las Vegas
12.plot: After years of running a successful bar in Las Vegas, all bets are off for an owner who spends more time drinking than running his bar. Can Taffer help this lost soul find his way?

13.title: Back to the Bar: The Power of Bacon and Beer
13.plot: Taffer revisits some of his favorite transformations, including the mega-successful Bacon Bar in Vegas, and The Aging Room at Cirivello's.

14.title: Father Knows Best
14.plot: A demanding father struggles to hand over the reins to his daughter or control his unruly customers at this failing biker bar in Central Florida.

15.title: Phishing for Answers
15.plot: A couple on the verge of bankruptcy battle their stubborn, lazy son before he sinks the family business.

16.title: Not Cleared for Takeoff
16.plot: Jon must help reignite a bar owner's passion for his notorious East LA music venue.

17.title: Back to the Bar: Tough Love
17.plot: Jon reconnects with bar owners Mark Wilson and Ozzie Ardavani to find out what's in store for their relationship, then checks in with La Luz's Edith and Juan Pablo Martinez.

18.title: Fish Out of Blue Water
18.plot: John helps a Chinese immigrant get control of his dream bar.

19.title: Bar Rescue: Operation Puerto Rico
19.plot: Jon Taffer and his crew head to Puerto Rico to tackle their biggest rescue yet in a one-hour special featuring a family-owned beach bar, El K'Rajo, after it was completely destroyed by Hurricane Maria.

20.title: Life, Liberty and the Pursuit of Fatballs
20.plot: Jon Taffer tries to rescue a Jacksonville sportsbar with a horrible reputation and an even worse name that leaves the bar without a single customer.

21.title: The Unwanted Saloon
21.plot: Jon calls in award-winning chef Kevin Bludso and master bartender Shawn Ford to help revive The Wanted Saloon bar in rural Tennessee.

22.title: Back to the Bar: The Tradewinds of Change
22.plot: Taffer revisits Tradewinds; Taffer returns to grill the owner of military bar 22 Klicks.

23.title: Star Lite, Star Not So Brite
23.plot: An absentee owner turns his back while profits go down the drain at his beer-only bar, sinking him into debt.

24.title: There Will Be Family Blood
24.plot: A novice owner opens a bar to help cover his sister's medical bills, but when he staffs it with his equally inexperienced relatives, the business quickly becomes a money pit.

1.title: Fallen Angels
1.plot: Corona, CA - Bar expert Jon Taffer attempts to rescue a failing biker bar that's struggling with rowdy clientele and a scandalous reputation due to its scantily clad bartenders and the fact it's located next to a strip club.

2.title: Downey's and Out
2.plot: Philadelphia, PA - Bar expert Jon Taffer attempts to resuscitate Downey's, a failing Irish pub in Philadelphia. To do that, he'll have to inspire Dom, a one-time star chef, turned negligent owner, who has let the bar go to ruin.

3.title: Shabby Abbey
3.plot: Jon is called in to help The Abbey, a family-owned Irish pub in Chicago that was once known for its music scene, food and drink but has fallen on hard times and is struggling to survive. He finds an inexperienced manager, a dangerously dirty kitchen and confused, leaderless and poorly trained staff.

4.title: Beach Bummer
4.plot: Jon tackles an Irish themed beach bar in Redondo Beach, California, called Kilkenny's. Jon attempts to create a bar with a cohesive identity that beach goers and locals will frequent.

5.title: Swanky Troubles
5.plot: Jon is called in to Swanky Bubbles, a champagne bar in Philadelphia that hasn't made money since 2004 and has a demoralized staff. The problems can be traced back to its two co-owners, one of whom is too busy hitting on the female customers and the other of whom is hardly ever there.

6.title: The Blue Frog Sings the Blues
6.plot: Chicago, IL - Bar expert Jon Taffer attempts to get The Blue Frog 22, a failing bar in Chicago, to grow up. To do that, he'll need the mother-and-son owners to ditch the "Mom's Basement" aesthetic that's dragging them down.

7.title: Bad to the Bone
7.plot: Boston, MA- Bar expert Jon Taffer sets off to help Bill, the owner of The Chicken Bone, avoid financial ruin. Bill, a former customer who took over the Bone, learned the hard way that running a bar is much tougher than it looks.

8.title: Chumps
8.plot: Jon must reorganize Champs, a failing sports bar in Burbank, California, which has problems with both its management and its employees.

9.title: Bar Fight
9.plot: Yorba Linda, CA - Bar expert Jon Taffer goes toe-to-toe with a former baseball player turned bar owner as he tries to revive the Canyon Inn, a decaying bar on its last legs. (Canyon Inn to Canyon Saloon)

10.title: Hogtied Ham's
10.plot: Boston, MA - Bar expert Jon Taffer attempts to save automotive-themed Angry Ham's Garage from stalling out. Rowdy owners and stonewalling city officials are all lurking right under the hood.

1.title: Yo-Ho-Ho and a Bottle of Dumb
1.plot: Bar Expert Jon Taffer must patch holes in a sinking Pirate-themed bar in Silver Spring, Maryland. However, mutiny is in the air when Jon forces the pirate staff to cater to the city's corporate clientele.

2.title: Tiki Curse
2.plot: Located on a prime stretch of beach, The Bamboo Beach Tiki Bar is still failing. Can Bar Expert Jon Taffer get a bevy of beautiful barmaids to fix this oceanfront eyesore instead of working on their suntans?

3.title: Murphy's Mess
3.plot: Bar Expert Jon Taffer must fix a rat-infested, binge-drinking bar owned by two fraternity brothers in Fells Point, Maryland. The rescue gets derailed when Jon discovers the building is about to collapse.

4.title: Mystique or Murder
4.plot: Jon must help turn around the Mystique Lounge, a nightclub in West Palm Beach, Florida, that's plagued by poorly trained staff, management problems and a bad reputation among locals since a murder occurred there three years previously.

5.title: Bottomless Pit
5.plot: Bar Expert Jon Taffer has his hands full with a failing dive bar in Orange, CA. When he discovers the owner is incapable of running the bar, Jon must pin his hopes on the owner's untested but eager daughter.

6.title: Broke Back Sheep
6.plot: Bar Expert Jon Taffer is called in to save the family-run "Black Sheep" in the Irish-German community of Cheviot, Ohio. But Jon discovers that the bar may be beyond rescue due to the owners' massive debt.

7.title: Weber's of Lies
7.plot: Bar Expert Jon Taffer must make Weber's, a former strip club in Reseda, California, profitable. However, when the bar's head bartender is caught stealing, Jon must convince the owner to take a stand.

8.title: Owner Ousted
8.plot: Bar Expert Jon Taffer must rescue a bar owned by a former Naval Officer and former Deputy Sherriff from total ruin. But when Jon discovers one of the owners isn't pulling his weight, Jon shows him the door.

9.title: On the Rocks
9.plot: Bar Expert Jon Taffer must save a failing former smoker's haven in Laguna Niguel, California from burning out for good. However, the bar's gang of hard-drinking regulars aren't about to give up their hangout.

10.title: Bikini Bust
10.plot: Despite beautiful bikini-clad bartenders, Extremes is less than a month from closing its doors. Can Bar Expert Jon Taffer successfully use the sexually-charged atmosphere to create a profitable bar?

1.title: Turtle on Its Back
1.plot: For a bar to fail on Bourbon Street in New Orleans it takes a special kind of incompetence. Can bar expert Jon Taffer get these delusional owners to ditch their copy-cat ways and start thinking for themselves?

2.title: Rock N Roaches
2.plot: Jon Taffer descends on a grotesque goth and rock bar in Austin, TX. Tasteless performances and cockroach infestations are the least of his problems as he spars with the worst bar owner to date.

3.title: Bros Got to Geaux!
3.plot: Jon Taffer comes to New Orleans tackles his first college bar run by the owners best friends.

4.title: Tears for Beers
4.plot: Bar Expert Jon Taffer fights to save a terminally hip bar on 6th St in Austin, TX that is too cool for its own customers. If he fails it will not only cost a husband & wife their business but possibly their marriage.

5.title: Empty Pockets
5.plot: Jon travels to Denver, Colorado and attempts to help Avi, the owner of Zan Z Bar. With bartenders who over-pour, a cook who never changes gloves, and drunk patrons who still get served, its no surprise that Avi is losing $3,000 a month.

6.title: Jon T, He Don't Like It
6.plot: 10 years ago, The Kasbah Lounge in Aurora, Colorado was an urban hotspot. Now it is a relic. Bar Expert Jon Taffer must breathe new life into this dying nightclub otherwise it will become extinct for good.

7.title: In a Pinch
7.plot: Lona's Wardlow Station has locals upset over a controversial lobster tank game. Can Bar Expert Jon Taffer bring peace to this blue-collar community?

8.title: Karaoke Katastrophe
8.plot: At Dimples, America's first karaoke bar, Jon Taffer must deal with dated dÃ©cor, an angry chef, and an oblivious owner... who's also a hoarder.

9.title: A Horse Walks Into a Bar
9.plot: Jon has to turn around a bar in a small Arizona town whose owners are drunk most of the time, the food is terrible, customers are out of control and the bank is about to foreclose because the owners are behind on their $180,000 mortgage.

10.title: Meat Sauna
10.plot: Bad ventilation cause hot, moist burger smoke to fill Scottsdale's least funny comedy club. Jon Taffer arrives to clear the air and use proven bar techniques to create bigger laughs and bigger profits for the troubled owners.

11.title: Don't Mess with Taffer's Wife
11.plot: An aggressive Las Vegas bar owner tries to pick up Nicole Taffer, sending Jon into a rage. Can he set this owner's wandering eyes straight and save a once famous blues bar without coming to blows first?

12.title: Play. Some. Janet. Jackson!
12.plot: Las Vegas' first gay nightclub, Gipsy, is months from closing its doors thanks to its verbally abusive and over intoxicated owner. Can Jon rescue one of Sin City's most famous landmarks?

13.title: Beer and Loathing in Las Vegas
13.plot: Hammers is a watering hole for blue-collar locals, owned and operated by two classically trained chefs and former friends. Taffer arrives to discover that both their business and their friendship appear beyond repair.

14.title: There's No Crying in the Bar Business
14.plot: Jon heads to a Georgia sports bar and encounters an owner whose incessant crying seems to prevent her noticing the massive employee theft issue occurring right under her nose.

15.title: Characters Assassination
15.plot: Charters Quarters might be the worst bar concept ever, but it's only 1 of the problems Jon must overcome at this confused establishment run by a family of Yankees in heart of Dixie.

16.title: Don't Judge a Booze by Its Bottle
16.plot: North Carolina's Cashmere Nightclub has a bad name, poor decor, and an embarrassing manager, but when Jon learns that they are refilling premium liquor bottles with cheap booze, all hell breaks loose.

17.title: Corking the Bunghole
17.plot: 13 miles from Fort Bragg, Cliques suffers from a juvenile name and a repugnant reputation. Jon puts the owners through his personal bar boot camp in the hopes of making it the R&R choice destination for local military personnel.

18.title: Bar Full of Bull
18.plot: A rickety mechanical bull fails to attract customers in this salty New England whaling community. Can Jon right this ship and prevent two siblings from sinking the bar and their father's retirement?

19.title: Two Flew Over the Handlebars
19.plot: Two buxom sisters have driven their biker bar in Pawcatuck, Connecticut into a ditch. Can Jon get these party women to stop binge drinking and focus on the real assets of their bar?

20.title: Barely Above Water
20.plot: Taffer makes two bars out of one in an attempt to save both a beachfront bar in Warwick, Rhode Island, and the owner's marriage.

21.title: Crappy Cantina
21.plot: Two brothers have drained their parents' retirement fund by opening an ill-conceived death-metal concert bar. Taffer arrives to run off the metal-head clientele & straighten out this festering mosh pit of failure.

22.title: Jon of the Dead
22.plot: Underworld is a "horror" bar run by 2 rocker-burnouts who managed to surpass their music industry failure with an even bigger failure in the bar biz. Jon attempts to transform this hive of scum & villainy into a profit center.

23.title: Grandpa Got Run Over by His Grandkids
23.plot: William invested $4 million on a Vegas bar to secure his kids & grandkids' futures. In return they use it as their private boozing & breeding grounds, wasting millions in the process. Can Jon turn this family tragedy around?

24.title: Drunk & Dirty Dolls
24.plot: This Vegas motorsports bar has come off the track thanks to an inept owner & a staff of busty cougars. Can Jon create a new & classy concept to tap into the largest single & divorced MILF population in the country?

25.title: Empty Bottles Full Cans
25.plot: Customers bringing in their own booze and bartenders flashing their boobs aren't Jon's biggest problems with this Tennessee watering hole. Taffer must ignite a lazy owner's ingenuity to save the bar from going bust.

26.title: Hole in None
26.plot: This golf-themed bar is a swing and a miss and its horrendous sanitary conditions are completely out of bounds. Jon must clean house and get rid of the filth as well as the staff responsible for making his expert sick.

27.title: Music City Mess
27.plot: BoondoxXx BBQ renamed Pit and Barrel. Spike TV pulled this because just before it aired bar owner Chris Michaels murdered Country Singer Wayne Mills, shooting him in the back of the head for smoking in the bar. Michaels sentenced to 20 yrs.

28.title: Brawlin' Babes
28.plot: Jon is called in to turn around Long Shot's, a failing sports bar in Grain Valley, Missouri, which suffers from battling female staffers, inept bartenders and dispirited management.

29.title: Critters and Quitters
29.plot: Lights, sirens and handcuffs greet Jon before he even enters the door of this Kansas City bar. Sibling rivalry between two identical twins with identical huge egos present Taffer with one of his toughest rescues.

30.title: Twin vs. Twin
30.plot: Lights, sirens and handcuffs greet Jon before he even enters the door of this Kansas City bar. Sibling rivalry between two identical twins with identical huge egos present Taffer with one of his toughest rescues.

31.title: Hostile Takeover
31.plot: A heavy drinking owner of an Irish sports bar is the subject of a hostile takeover...by his co-owners!

32.title: I Smell a Rat
32.plot: Profits are going up in smoke due to the overwhelming odors and frat house behavior at this hookah bar.

33.title: Punch-Drunk & Trailer-Trashed
33.plot: A dysfunctional family's feuding pushes Jon Taffer to the limit. Will their outrageous antics force Taffer into an extreme decision?

34.title: Grow Some Meatballs!
34.plot: At a family run bar, a brother and sister are locked in conflict with their explosive father. But while Taffer struggles to train an inexperienced staff, disaster is about to ignite in the kitchen.

35.title: When Life Doesn't Hand You Lemons
35.plot: Too busy canoodling to notice his staff is sinking, a manager treats his bar like a romantic playground, forcing Taffer to demand inside help from the bartenders.

36.title: Scoreboard to Death
36.plot: Taffer is joined by celebrity guests Maria Menounos & Adam Carolla as he takes over a failing sports bar, wrangles with an incompetent owner and deals with an undertrained staff.

37.title: Taxed Out in Texas
37.plot: Torn apart by a dysfunctional staff and a bad reputation, a tax accountant turned bar owner struggles to keep his biker bar afloat.

38.title: Muscle Madness
38.plot: Two muscle-bound meatheads can't see pec-to-pec on how to run their Houston bar. Now, their tempers and testosterone threaten to tear their friendship apart.

39.title: Scary Mary's
39.plot: The lecherous owner of a dying Texas dive crosses the line with one of Taffer's experts.

994.title: Taffer's Top 10: Most Disgusting Bars
994.plot: Jon counts down the ten most disgusting bars he's rescued during the first three seasons of Bar Rescue.

995.title: Taffer's Top 10: Worst Owners
995.plot: Jon counts down the ten worst owners he's encountered during the first three seasons of Bar Rescue.

996.title: Taffer's Top 10: Toughest Rescues
996.plot: Jon counts down the ten toughest rescues he's undertaken during the first three seasons of Bar Rescue.

997.title: Taffer's Top 10: Angriest Moments
997.plot: Jon counts down the ten angriest moments he's encountered during the first three seasons of Bar Rescue.

1.title: Bug Bite
1.plot: A nightclub resorts to an 18-and-over night to draw a crowd, but ends up liable for unruly teenagers while an infestation of mosquitos and fruit flies puts the owner in a precarious position.

2.title: Thugs with Mugs
2.plot: Bar Patrons discover the owners of a failing bar in Yonkers are refilling premium liquor with cheap booze, which leads to an assault on Jon's camera crew.

3.title: Schmuck Dynasty
3.plot: Fireworks spark when abrasive customers overrun a Staten Island bar, cooking their own food, pouring their own drinks and calling the shots. Can this family regain control before it's too late?

4.title: El Moronte
4.plot: A passionate Puerto Rican bar owner berates his staff and sons as the bar sinks further into debt. Can Taffer deflate the owner's ego in order to save his bar?

5.title: Anything You Can Yell, I Can Yell Louder
5.plot: Three loud-mouthed firefighting brothers struggle to keep their Queens bar afloat. Can Taffer calm the sparks before this family implodes?

6.title: To Protect and to (Over) Serve
6.plot: A former Philly detective-turned-bar owner hits the bottle hard after years of dark days on the force when Jon Taffer shows up to straighten him out.

7.title: A Dash of Bitters
7.plot: It's a bitter brawl when Taffer shows up at this rescue enlisting the help of the owner's ex-wife and former manager to turn the bar around.

8.title: Swinging from the Rafters
8.plot: An outrageous lakeside bar owner spends more time swinging from the rafters than managing his bar, causing Taffer to abandon ship until the owner can face reality.

9.title: Spoiled Brat Party
9.plot: Jon Taffer embarks on a cross-country tour of the worst drinking establishments in America. Bad drinks, wild staffs and wasted owners conspire against him and his experts as they give failing businesses one last shot at success.

10.title: Irish Eyes Aren't Smiling
10.plot: Jon Taffer embarks on a cross-country tour of the worst drinking establishments in America. Bad drinks, wild staffs and wasted owners conspire against him and his experts as they give failing businesses one last shot at success.

11.title: Second Base, Third Strike
11.plot: In a first-ever re-rescue, Jon Taffer returns to Second Base Bar & Grill to find a disengaged owner who has let the bar deteriorate. Will Jon save this bar once again?

12.title: Crayons & Anger Lines
12.plot: A hippy-dippy live music bar owner is more concerned with the spirit of wonderment than appealing to her trendy Chicago community, causing Taffer to enforce some tough love.

13.title: Beach Rats
13.plot: This failing beachfront bar is shut down after rodents invade the kitchen, but Taffer is brought to tears upon discovering what the owners have endured.

14.title: All Twerk & No Pay
14.plot: Too busy dancing on the bar top to pour drinks, these out-of-control bartenders are in for a shock when Jon Taffer puts an end to the party.

15.title: Bromancing the Stone
15.plot: Jon Taffer has his hands full with the owner of an outdated college sports bar who is more interested in managing his fantasy football team than running a business.

16.title: Storming the Castle
16.plot: Jon Taffer arrives at this castle-shaped bar to a surly owner with anger management issues whose attitude has pushed his staff to their breaking points.

17.title: Lagers and Liars
17.plot: Celebrity guest Maria Menounos joins Jon Taffer at this Los Angeles beer bar where a million dollar debt and decision to keep or sell the business has triggered a family divide.

18.title: Loose Lips Loose Tips
18.plot: Jon is called to rescue a San Francisco bar run by four Irish sisters who bicker and argue amongst themselves.

19.title: Mandala Down
19.plot: A self-proclaimed "nightlife expert" afflicted by mounting debt and a ballooning ego butts heads with Jon Taffer as he battles to show him the error of his ways.

20.title: Sticky Situation
20.plot: A sons excessive partying and drinking and a couch used in a porn film at a family owned bar is causing profits to drop.

21.title: Take Me Out to the Bar Game
21.plot: Jon is called in to help a former MLB pitcher bring his staff back under control before he sinks deeper into debt.

22.title: Emergency Exit
22.plot: An ex-pilot must mend things with his partner and cut ties with his ex-girlfriend before Jon can save this Reno bar.

23.title: It's Always Sunny in Portland
23.plot: Jon arrives in Portland to fix a bar with a bar owner whose not focusing on his bar, an inexperienced step-daughter who berates her staff, and an angry chef who does not want women in his kitchen.

24.title: Brokedown Palace
24.plot: Taffer is assisted by Alexander Siddig and Iddo Goldberg, the stars of Spike's event series TUT, to help him rescue a Moroccon bar with an identity crisis.

25.title: Ants with Wings, Bro!
25.plot: The owner of a Portland rock bar is not running his business properly, cocktails are being made up on the spot by inexperienced bartenders, the bands they book are driving away customers, and ants and pests are nesting in the kitchen.

26.title: Put a Cork in It
26.plot: An eccentric wine bar owner is too busy being the life of a party to notice that his business is withering on the vine.

27.title: Too Many Managers! Not Enough Man!
27.plot: Jon Taffer battles with a management-heavy staff that disrespects their owner at this suburban Chicago sports bar.

28.title: Jon Ain't Afraid of Ghosts
28.plot: Jon Taffer is forced to stir up a different type of spirit than he's used to in order to save haunted bar with a cursed past.

29.title: Till Debt Do Us Part
29.plot: Jon is caught between a womanizing owner and his enraged wife in a run-down Caribbean bar. Can Taffer turns this bar around before the business hits the rocks and the owner's wife hits the road?

30.title: Shamrocks and Shenanigans
30.plot: A failing Irish bar with battling bartenders calls in Taffer to show an idle owner the error of his ways, before his fiancée leaves him.

31.title: Blowing Royal Smoke
31.plot: The oldest bar and BBQ joint in Youngstown, Ohio is in the pits as feuding brothers drive away customers with their obnoxious behavior. Can Jon Taffer put the fire back in their bellies before their business goes up in smoke?

32.title: Sour Lemons and Bitter Business
32.plot: A landlord and bar owner is more interested in his artwork while his partnership with two brother is corroding and the bar falls deeper into debt.

33.title: Ripper's Rookie House
33.plot: Jon Taffer embarks on a cross-country tour of the worst drinking establishments in America. Bad drinks, wild staffs and wasted owners conspire against him and his experts as they give failing businesses one last shot at success.

34.title: Big Sister's Watching
34.plot: In a struggling military bar, a distrustful owner spends her time spying on her staff instead of watching her bottom line.

35.title: Vulgar Vixens
35.plot: Jon confronts a foul-mouthed owner in this failing Michigan bar with a confusing theme. Can Taffer turn profanity into profits before this bar goes bust?

36.title: Unnecessary Toughness
36.plot: At a college alumni bar, Taffer is forced to deal with a hot-headed sports bar owner whose fiery temper keeps his staff on edge and his million dollar debt on ice.

37.title: Boss Lady Blues
37.plot: A former psychologist runs a Detroit jazz club, but her interfering family and lazy staff have her seeking help from John Taffer.

38.title: Bare Rescue
38.plot: In a Bar Rescue first, Jon Taffer helps a failing Detroit strip club in the hopes of stimulating profits before the entire business goes bottoms up.

39.title: Hard Heads and Softballs
39.plot: For Bar Rescue's 100th episode, Taffer is called to settle the score between two feuding bar owners, one with his foot out the door and the other with his marriage on the line, in a bar that is literally split in half.

40.title: Dragon Lady
40.plot: An apathetic owner would rather vape in the corner than engage with customers at her own bar. Can Taffer turn the situation around before the entire business goes up in smoke?

41.title: Paradise Lost
41.plot: Three owners are locked in a hostile feud after Taffer exposes that one of them is siphoning the profits.

42.title: Land of the Beer and Home of the Misbehaved
42.plot: Expanding her business to a downtown sports bar, a successful St. Louis restaurant owner risks losing everything as her out-of-control nephew and unqualified manager run the bar and her livelihood into the ground.

43.title: Getting Freaky at the Tiki
43.plot: Jon Taffer is no stronger to finding rats, roaches, and raccoons inside the bars he rescues. But his discovery of a used condom at this rundown Florida tiki bar redefines owner neglect.

44.title: How to Train the Dragon
44.plot: After the tragic loss of his mother, the owner of this British pub is destroying his family legacy, by drinking the profits and gambling his way to ruin with his weekly poker tournaments.

45.title: Demolition Man
45.plot: The city threatens to shut down a bar after the owner unsafely renovates without a permit. Can Taffer school the clueless rookie owner and bring the construction disaster up to code before the city intervenes?

46.title: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Boat
46.plot: A grieving son struggles to keep his fisherman bar and father's legacy afloat, while the weight of his family's criticism are slowly sinking his business.

47.title: Danny Sits on His Fanny
47.plot: After convincing his friends to invest their life savings, a rookie bar owner has transformed a community staple into a bottomless money pit. Will a hostile takeover revive the business before the investors go bankrupt?

48.title: Gone in a Flash
48.plot: A timid bar owner looks the other way as her promiscuous staff expose themselves in an effort to retain their customers. Can Jon Taffer clean up their reputation before the staff's assets strip the bar's profits bare?

49.title: Momster's Ball
49.plot: A bar owner relies on her attractive bartender daughters and spaghetti wrestling events to lure customers in the door. But mounting debt, a lack of female customers, and a family feud threaten the future.

50.title: Drunk on Punk
50.plot: An egotistic owner refuses to change his punk rock theme. His obnoxious attitude and obsession for the punk scene forces Jon to reconsider saving his bar.

51.title: Raising Arizona
51.plot: Jon is brought to a small Arizona town to rescue a country bar with an owner whose illicit affairs with other women produced a child and cost him his family.

1.title: The Perks of Being a Wallpaper
1.plot: The owner of a Vegas dive bar known to be a former mob hangout is too much of a nice guy and not enough of a tough boss as his bar is failing.

2.title: Wheels of Misfortune
2.plot: A bar with a roller rink in a California desert town is on it's last legs, until Taffer arrives to access the situation.

3.title: 12 Beers a Slave
3.plot: An owner spent his life savings on a run down bar, and attempted a fetish night to bring in more clientele, but has to face defiance and drama from members of his staff.

4.title: Antisocial Media
4.plot: A small town California bar owner is driving away business, not just through bad service, but through negative comments he posts on social media.

5.title: How to Train Your Goldfish
5.plot: Nasty nachos & goldfish races are on the menu at this sports pub. But in a Bar Rescue first, a staffing crisis hits before the stress test, leaving the owners without any employees. Can Taffer right the ship before it drowns?

6.title: Win, Lose or Brawl
6.plot: When a brawl breaks out in a failing bar, Jon reconsiders a possible rescue.

7.title: Listen Y'all It's Sabotage
7.plot: The new owners of a Washington bar are accusing their manager, also the former owner, of attempting to destroy the business from the inside. One of the owners snap when one of the bartenders storm out and quit.

8.title: Gettin' Jigger with It
8.plot: A historic San Francisco bar, founded by legendary boxer Sam Jordan, is in dire need of saving. Profits are divided and the children of the late ring fighter can't work with each other.

9.title: Chase Lounge
9.plot: A car salesman sees profits draining courtesy of a lazy and unreliable stepson/manager who lacks in leadership and allows the bar to lose money.

10.title: Zero Drunk Thirty
10.plot: A military hero on the verge of being redeployed needs a rescue of his own, before he drinks away his profits and angers his bartender girlfriend past the point of no return.

11.title: Ice, Mice, Baby
11.plot: After receiving a nightclub from his successful father, a spoiled bar owner drains profits while his employees are barely making anything, and allows mice and filth within the establishment.

12.title: Punk as a Drunk
12.plot: After a series of family tragedies, a former punk musician allows his inexperienced staff to cost him money. His obscene roughhousing with his workers ignites Taffer.

13.title: Don't Tell Mom the Bar Is Dead
13.plot: Jon is brought to a craft beer bar to help an owner who lacks in staff, drinks away profits, and takes advantage of his mother's generosity before the landlord evicts him from the establishment.

14.title: I Know What You Did Last Summit
14.plot: An owner, returning from his absence, nearly ruins his marriage by drinking away profits, goofing off, and flirting with female patrons. Can Jon fix the bar and the marriage?

15.title: Struck Out at the Dugout
15.plot: After evicting a tenant who refused to pay rent, a drunken owner degrades his sports bar, allows flies to scour the establishment. His ego, constant drinking, and excuses push the staff to their breaking point.

18.title: All Twerk and No Pay Makes Taffer Shut It Down
18.plot: An owner twerks her way to tears when her bar gets out of step.

19.title: Bar Over Troubled Water
19.plot: After the 2016 flood damage in Louisiana, an owner of a successful bar who is desperate to restore his establishment is seeking Jon's help to get his business up and running again.

20.title: Desi, You Got Some 'Splainin' to Do
20.plot: After suffering a massive stroke, a veteran bar owner lets his bar slip away as he drinks down profits and builds his debt.

21.title: Back to the Bar: Hallelujah for Jon
21.plot: Former bar owners return to praise Taffer for turning around their businesses, including an owner once accused of embezzlement by his father, a vape-smoking dragon lady who crafted conflict in her St. Louis bar & more.

22.title: Casually Tapped Out
22.plot: In a Bar Rescue first, Jon must resurrect a closed neighborhood bar by reigniting the passion of the burnt-out firefighter who owns it.

23.title: Things That Go Pahrump in the Night
23.plot: Its a race against the clock when Jon Taffer heads to Pahrump where he must save the failing bar of a man who might lose his sight forever.

24.title: Mother Doesn't Know Best
24.plot: Jon Taffer must convince the ultimate maternal figure to make her decisions like a business owner to save her struggling Las Vegas dive bar from closing its doors.

25.title: Silence of the Ants
25.plot: Jon arrives in Long Beach to save a filthy bar plagued by fruit flies and ants.

26.title: Daddy Dearest
26.plot: Jon Taffer arrives just in time to save a family run bar on the brink of ruin with an aggressive father at its helm.

27.title: Rickety Rockin' Rhonda
27.plot: It's a race against the clock as Jon Taffer tries to rescue a failing bar with a crumbling floor.

28.title: The Unlucky Leprechaun
28.plot: Jon Taffer has to convince a foul-mouthed owner to change his ways before the bar he owns with his ex-wife shuts down for good.

29.title: Back to the Bar: For Whom the Cajun Belle Tolls
29.plot: Taffer revisits The Cajun Belle to see if husband Dave still supports his hard-working wife and if their marriage needs another rescue, checks in on the partnership at Hammer & Ales, and heads back to The Wildcatter.

-1.title: Back to the Bar: Flying Fist and Bar Brawls
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: In Spike TV's new series, Bar Rescue, Jon Taffer, one of the country's top restaurant and bar consultants, will give failing establishments one last chance to succeed. The show will delve into every business facet of running a bar from creating a profitable drink/food menu to crowd management to music selection to managing disgruntled employees. This marks the first food/beverage-themed show for Spike TV, furthering its effort to expand and broaden its audience. Taffer will use his "in-your-face" style along with his renowned method of management called "Taffer Dynamics" to transform the bar into a vibrant, profitable establishment. He will utilize everything from state-of-the-art science such as eye tracking technology, monitoring of body temperature and even reading pheromone output in patrons in order to create an ambitious plan of action. Taffer will focus on one establishment per episode from cities all around the country. Taffer's wife, Nicole, will appear in the show along with a rotating group of experts.
imdb.title: Bar Rescue
